text: The women's Kurash 52 kilograms competition at the 2018 Asian Games in Jakarta, Indonesia was held on 28 August at the JCC Assembly Hall. Kurash is a traditional martial art from Uzbekistan that resembles wrestling. There are three assessment system in Kurash, namely Halal, Yambosh, and Chala. Halal is if an athlete Kurash is able to slam his opponent in the back. Yambosh is the imperfect of Halal, two Yambosh same as Halal. Gulnor Sulaymanova from Uzbekistan won the gold medal after beating Pincky Balhara of India in gold medal bout. ==Schedule== All times are Western Indonesia Time (UTC+07:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! width=220|Date ! width=50|Time ! width=100|Event |- | rowspan=5|Tuesday, 28 August 2018 || 14:00 || Round of 32 |- | 14:00 || Round of 16 |- | 14:00 || Quarterfinals |- | 18:00 || Semifinals |- | 18:00 || bgcolor=ffffcc|Final |} ==Results== ===Final=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== ==External links== *Official website Women's 52 kg
title: Kurash at the 2018 Asian Games – Women's 52 kg
